author: solomax
msg: OPENMEETINGS-157 fixed. Deprecated attributes/methods of openlaszlo animation/animationgroup 'start' and 'doStart' were replaced with up-to-date attribute 'started'.

author: kazk
msg: Fixes GORA-151 to check if keyspace already exists

author: jacopoc
msg: Removed some Geronimo/RMI specific code that was causing issues during system shutdown (several attempts to shutdown the RMIContainer); the code had also some tweaks that made the classes less readable; the static containerMap in ContainerLoader was breaking thread safety because the put operations were not atomic with the related add operations of the loadedContainers list.

author: jacopoc
msg: Small improvement: better log messages during system shutdown.
